title: 1Dq
author: 1Dq
content: I'm happy to put on auction my colorful imagination of Vitalik Buterin's world of Etherium. Etheria, 2018, Acrylics on canvas, 60x40cm/23,6”x15,7”  Bid Format:  BTCStarting Bid: 0.02 BTCMinimum Bid Increment: 0.005 BTCAuction End Time: Thursday, November 30st, 2023 @23:59:59 CET  countdown clock: https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/generic?iso=20231130T00&p0=736&msg=Auction+end&font=sanserif&csz=1Sniping:  15 minute standard sniping rule - Any bid made within the last 15 minutes of the auction, will restart a 15 minute clock for each bid thereafter.Shipping: Paid for by buyer. Ships from Europe. Buyer responsible for any and all customs/duties. Seller is responsible for packaging cost! Payment Address: 1Dqt8AsKaRdaWNqruPmUkqseqLm9YXZaPPayment Due: Within 24 hoursEscrow: Available at cost of buyer...Etheria, 2018, Acrylics on canvas, 60x40cm/23,6”x15,7” I got the idea from photo below.And I instantly knew I needed to do this.

comments.author: 1Dq
comments.body: *Half way there BUMP*Me and my crypto mate made a T-shirt with the motif of Etheria back in the day.Wish we lived in US where it'd be a bit easier to spread this kind of merch...

comments.author: 1Dq
comments.body: AUCTION ended.No bids at this occasion, see you next time.Cheers.
